I believe mosquitoes are not a reason but a pretext to test that toxin.
Come on! Few years ago a hacker managed to burn the wings of female mosquitoes repurposing commodity hardware and burning those bloodsuckers' wings with a blueray laser. 
Now the first viable solution are neuro toxins? Unbelievable!
